plot: A family hire a man to exterminate the monster that lives under their little boys bed, when we learn that there's more than just an extermination going on
title: Harvey: The Monster Catcher
plot_es: A family hire a man to exterminate the monster that lives under their little boys bed, when we learn that there's more than just an extermination going on
plot_en: A family hire a man to exterminate the monster that lives under their little boys bed, when we learn that there's more than just an extermination going on
